0.1.name: wordpress/fastest-css-editor-with-live-preview
0.1.description:
This is simple and easy to use WordPress plugin for css editing.

Please keep in mind that this is beta. It may have couple bugs.

Live Preview

Edit your css and instantly see changes.

Organize Your Selectors

Separated selectors and properties let you keep everything organized.

Selector Picker

Easy selector picker and tree view will help you choose selector that you need.

Saving & Publishing

Edit and test your css before anyone else can see it. If you want to save your changes click SAVE. If you're ready click PUBLISH.

Feedback (report bug, propose new features or just comment) https://docs.google.com/spreadsheet/viewform?formkey=dEdDYUF2UmZJaTluRTBkeWpaQ3UxaEE6MQ

Coder, like any other animal require food to stay aliv
